xml.Basic_theory: What is testing, bug reports, documentation, types, methods, testing directions, SDLC, STLC
xml.HTTP: HTTP methods, HTTP server response codes, structures of HTTP inputs and responses
xml.Postman: API testing via Postman, JS, API autotests
xml.Logs: Removing and reading logs from an external server
xml.Charles_Fiddler: Sniffing http web traffic and interception of traffic on iOS, Android
xml.Dev_Tools: Web Dev Tools of Google Chrome, FireFox
xml.VPN: How it works, why you need it, how to use it, tool options
xml.Mobile_testing: Features of mobile testing, special cases
xml.Proxy_vpn: Setting up on iOS and Android
xml.Terminal_Linux: copy, create, view, move files on servers without a graphical interface
xml.Basics_bash_scripting: Automation of routine tasks on the server
xml.SQL: basic operators: create, delete, delete, insert, select from, where, join
xml.Redis: Non-relational database installation, configuration and use
